title: Young Millionaires
overview: Friday the 13th in Marseille, childhood friends Samia, LÃ©o, David and Jess hit the lottery jackpot. But at 17, it's impossible to cash the ticket... the first problem of a long series, because hitting the jackpot at this age opens the door to an avalanche of problems. Because you can't be serious when you're 17 with 17 million!
